about.p1:
Waleed Medaa Group is a Syrian architectural firm based in Damascus, delivering comprehensive architectural and construction solutions for high-end projects.

The firm specializes in construction management and supervision, providing end-to-end services from concept through execution. With multidisciplinary design and management teams across all engineering fields, Waleed Medaa Group ensures full project coordination, technical excellence, and execution precision.
about.p2: Our work spans residential housing, commercial real estate, logistics centers, leisure developments, and high-rise buildings. Every project is approached with a commitment to quality, functionality, and architectural integrity, with the ultimate goal of meeting—and surpassing—client expectations.

services.title: Architecture
services.text: We design buildings that are purposeful, enduring, and deeply connected to their surroundings. Our architectural services combine creativity with technical rigor to deliver clear, buildable solutions.

services.title: Interior Design
services.text: We create refined interior environments that balance aesthetics, functionality, and material quality. Our interior design approach ensures cohesive spaces that enhance user experience and complement the architectural vision.

services.title: Layout Planning
services.text: We develop efficient layout solutions that optimize circulation, usability, and spatial clarity. Each plan is carefully structured to support functionality, flexibility, and long-term performance.

services.title: Project Management
services.text: We provide comprehensive project management and construction supervision services to ensure projects are delivered on time, within budget, and to the highest quality standards.
